details:
usb: typec: ucsi: Don't attempt to resume the ports before they exist

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.11 by commit fdd11d7136fd070b3a74d6d8799d9eac28a57fc5, it was introduced in version v6.1.1 by commit 9222912924fcf56e2d166a503eddbdb5ffd2005f. For more details please see the references link.
summary: usb: typec: ucsi: Don't attempt to resume the ports before they exist
